channel.title: Dungeoneering?
channel.description: Well once I get 50 RC on my botting account, I plan on training dungeoneering a bit. Anyways, since its really a skill-only account, can I solo dungeons without killing anything? Or will that be impossible?

item.title: Dungeoneering?
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“Mitko, post:18, topic:354959”][quote author=lunaghand link=topic=451525.msg3313870#msg3313870 date=1282166282]

Can someone tell me how it works?

I can’t even get to the dungeons… i go to the waiting room with only the party interface opened, stayed there for 5 minutes and nothing happens. I go with nothing, still the same.

lollll, okay first, open party interface, form party, then go into the dungeon entrance if you wanna go solo.
If you want to have people with you, do all the same up to entering the dungeon, and just right click on any player and invite.
If you need any more help, just pm me.
[/quote]It says i can’t get past the barrier if i have formed a party. Doesn’t let me do it while i’m inside too.[/quote]there’s cave entrances on the west-east wing.

Read full topic

If you want to have people with you, do all the same up to entering the dungeon, and just right click on any player and invite.
If you need any more help, just pm me.[/quote]EDIT: nvm. Thanks.

[quote=“Mitko, post:15, topic:354959”]Can someone tell me how it works?

I can’t even get to the dungeons… i go to the waiting room with only the party interface opened, stayed there for 5 minutes and nothing happens. I go with nothing, still the same. :|[/quote]

lollll, okay first, open party interface, form party, then go into the dungeon entrance if you wanna go solo.
If you want to have people with you, do all the same up to entering the dungeon, and just right click on any player and invite.
If you need any more help, just pm me.

item.title: Dungeoneering?
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“lunaghand, post:12, topic:354959”]You can multiple login with your main and botter, then do all the work on your main, and either let your bot sit there, or make noncombat items. So then, both accounts get dungeoneering exp ^.^ (but you’ll need 2 diff computers)

P.S.
What rc bot do you use?[/quote]I’m using Garrett’s Air Crafter script on RSBot.

Read full topic

item.title: Dungeoneering?
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

AIO RuneCrafter I believe? It’s what I use on my skiller.

item.title: Dungeoneering?
item.dc:creator: @lunaghand lunaghand
item.description:
@lunaghand wrote:

You can multiple login with your main and botter, then do all the work on your main, and either let your bot sit there, or make noncombat items. So then, both accounts get dungeoneering exp ^.^ (but you’ll need 2 diff computers)

P.S.
What rc bot do you use?

[quote author=Chassy13 link=topic=451525.msg3309590#msg3309590 date=1281892642]

Lol alright I might try Dungeoneering on my main, but I was hoping to be able to solo to 45 for that mining area in the Mining Guild :3 Thar be rune rocks.

Yeah, but you won’t be the only one there.
[/quote]I know, but it would still be worth a shot.
[/quote]I can help you if you want, but make sure to make me a shitload of pots and food
add “pure2veteran”[/quote]I’m F2P on both my main and botter :3

Oi, I forgot to start up my bot again .-. 6.6k air runs left for 50 RC

item.title: Dungeoneering?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

You won’t get a lot of XP unless you kill the boss. Also several rooms with guardian doors will require you to kill all of the monsters inside that room before you can open the door.

If you wish to train Dungeoneering on a skilling account, you’ll need a few friends who won’t mind completing the dungeon while you either A) Do nothing or B) Gather resources such as food and potions to make for them.

Search for the player “Tre” on the hiscores. He has some nice friends.

Read full topic

item.title: Dungeoneering?
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“n10si t, post:4, topic:354959”]You end up back in the starting room, and each death lowers your xp total at the end of a dungeon.[/quote]Meh <.< Guess I can’t exactly solo then.
